## HDOMImplementation.replaceChild() method

A (potentially) optimized version of these 2 operations in sequence:

```
impl.removeChild(parent, child);
impl.createTree(parent, child, newTree);

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
replaceChild(opts: Partial<HDOMOpts>, parent: T, child: number, newTree: any, init?: boolean): T | T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opts | <code>Partial&lt;HDOMOpts&gt;</code> |  |
|  parent | <code>T</code> | parent node in target (e.g. DOM element) |
|  child | <code>number</code> | child index |
|  newTree | <code>any</code> | component tree |
|  init | <code>boolean</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T | T[]`
